div.h1: OpenSearch -- A simple XML web service for information retrieval

div.p: This is my personal story of 'my' part of the digitization workflow of The Royal Library. There are a lot of people working on this, and I'm only involved in the metadata processing & dissemination part. And within this area there are several persons working; I'm not even the project leader.
This entry is the second part of something that undoubtedly will become a series, because there are so much to consider in a beast like this.

What I'm not going to talk about today is the image processing, because when we started this that part of the system was a boundary condition; it was there already. What we're up to is the processing of metadata, and the dissemination of them on the Worldwide Web.

Categories: XML web services, Metadata processing
